glsa.title: liblouis: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in liblouis, the worst of which could result in denial of service.

background.p: liblouis is an open-source braille translator and back-translator.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in liblouis. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All liblouis users should upgrade to the latest version:
